task: Look up the British pronunciation of the word \"euphoria\" and find an example sentence using that word on the Cambridge Dictionary.
Look up the British pronunciation of the word \"euphoria\" and find an example sentence using that word on the Cambridge Dictionary.
user_action_and_explanation: type "euphoria" into the search bar with placeholder "Search English—Chinese (Traditional)", then press enter to find its pronunciation and example sentence.
observation: The British pronunciation of "euphoria" is /juːˈfɔː.ri.ə/. An example sentence found is: "In our experience, euphoria, in contrast to silly, disinhibited behavior, is rarely observable in children in an office setting."
